urls.title: Secretary of State appointed vacancies for the Environment Agency Boar
urls.description: Recently Government announced the Secretary of State, working closely with the Chair of the Environment Agency, is seeking to appoint three new members to the Board of the Environment Agency. Applications are encouraged by 2 June.

text: Do you have expertise in flood and coastal erosion risk management or land management? We're encouraging members to apply for the @EnvAgency's new board vacancies. Find out more here üëâ https://t.co/08Myf6dypR https://t.co/g15yaYNaVn

urls.title: Trent cyanide pollution case collapses
urls.description: Red Industries has been cleared of polluting the Trent with cyanide following a four-year investigation by the Environment Agency. The judge labelled the agency‚Äôs case ‚Äúshambolic‚Äù
